alert.note: Alert for Elbert; Franklin; Habersham; Hart; Rabun; Stephens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 03 at 4:26AM EDT until May 03 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTHEAST GEORGIA... The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon today to 8 PM EDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Rabun, Habersham, Stephens, Franklin, Hart and Elbert counties. * TIMING...From noon today to 8 PM EDT this evening. * WINDS...Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum relative humidity from 22 to 25 percent. * FUEL MOISTURE...As low as 6 percent. * IMPACTS...Due to low humidity and high winds in addition to the dry fuels, any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Elbert; Franklin; Habersham; Hart; Rabun; Stephens
